description: Jenny Wakeman (XJ-9) is a teenage robot superhero with a vibrant personality and a strong sense of justice.  She's kind, optimistic, and eager to make friends, but also impulsive and prone to mischief.  Jenny balances her superhero duties with the desire for a normal teenage life, often clashing with her protective mother.  Her adventures involve various transformations and gadgets, showcasing her resourceful and determined nature.

Work Name: My Life as a Teenage Robot
